original_text: The Lord said to Moses, “Go up into this mountain of Abarim and see the land that I have given to the people of Israel.
korean_text: 여호와께서 모세에게 이르시되 너는 이 아바림 산에 올라가서 내가 이스라엘 자손에게 준 땅을 바라보라

sentences.original_text: Go up into this mountain of Abarim
that I have given to the people of Israel.
